title: Research Projects
text:
Duration: 2022 - Present
Institution: IUSS Pavia
Funding: EU Horizon 2020
Developing integrated crop models to assess climate change impacts on smallholder farming systems in Sub-Saharan Africa. This project combines field data, satellite imagery, and machine learning approaches to improve yield predictions under changing climate conditions.
Key Achievements: - Calibrated DSSAT models for maize and sorghum in Kenya - Developed early warning system for drought risk - Published 3 peer-reviewed papers
Technologies: R, Python, DSSAT, Google Earth Engine, QGIS




Duration: 2023 - Present
Institution: University of Copenhagen (Collaboration)
Location: Viborg, Denmark
Investigating heat stress impacts on olive and grape production systems in the Mediterranean region using controlled environment studies and field experiments.
Key Achievements: - Established temperature-yield response curves - Identified critical growth stages for heat sensitivity - Developed adaptation strategies for farmers
Technologies: Growth chambers, Data loggers, Statistical modeling




Duration: 2021 - 2022
Institution: IUSS Pavia
Created a web-based platform for visualizing climate risks to agriculture at regional scales. The platform integrates multiple data sources to provide actionable insights for farmers and policymakers.
Key Achievements: - Interactive web dashboard with 10+ risk indicators - User-friendly interface for non-technical stakeholders - Adopted by 3 regional agricultural agencies
Technologies: JavaScript, D3.js, PostgreSQL, Python Flask

title: Victor Nyabuti Ong‚Äôera
text:
I‚Äôm a PhD Candidate in Sustainable Development & Climate Change at IUSS Pavia, specializing in crop modeling and climate risk reduction. My research focuses on bridging the gap between climate science and agricultural practice to develop sustainable, climate-resilient farming solutions.



Climate-Smart Agriculture: Developing adaptive strategies for smallholder farmers
Crop Modeling: Using computational models to predict climate impacts on agriculture

Risk Assessment: Quantifying climate risks to food security
